Regular Expressions: Use regular expressions to find specific fields.
Request Manipulation: Replace the email value in the intercepted Post Request with a controlled one.
JavaScript Analysis: Identify JavaScript variable storing user details.
Database Manipulation: Attempt to concatenate large integers in SQLite.
URL and Redirect Analysis: Understand that redirects to 'http://app/login.php' will not solve the challenge
Token and Security Analysis: Discover that the server generates a JWT token.
Network Communication Analysis: Understood that the server uses Python's requests library to issue GET requests to the submitted URL.
Gopher Protocol Interaction: Communicate with any TCP server using Gopher protocol.
Cookie Handling: Ensure the completion of navigation and placement of the cookie by sleeping for 1 second.
URL Access: Access the provided URL for the decryption service.
Password Verification Analysis: Investigate verifyPassword() and observe the use of bcrypt password verification.
String Manipulation: The iterated character is added to the 'flag'.
XSS Payload Injection: Sent this XSS payload through the data endpoint
Include the XSS payload in the URL.
External Script Usage: Use the script available at https://github.com/lijiejie/ds_store_exp.
URL Length Limit Testing: Experiment with creating a URL that just hits the length limit
Time-Based Analysis: Checked if the search took more than 50ms.
PHP Shell Execution: Note that the PHP shell can be executed by visiting the uploaded file
HTTP Method Analysis: Leverage the assumption that a POST request might be needed.
Account Credential Enumeration: Discovered that using 'test' or 1-- - can obtain possible account credentials
Note Manipulation: Identify the POST request to /add for adding notes.
Deduce that the '$ne' filter checks if the body of the notes is not empty.
Email Variable Analysis: 'smtp_exec' variable is used in sending activation emails
Hashing Requirement Analysis: Identify the requirement of same MD5 hash for the two PDFs.
File Inclusion Vulnerability: Recognize that XInclude directives allow the parsing of files.
Cookie Value Modification: Set the new flag value as the cookie
Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) Attack: Understand that the challenge involves a Same-Origin XSS attack
